languages.text: Налог, взимаемый Администратумом практически с каждой планеты Империума под неусыпным взором Адептус Арбитес.

traits.locale_text: Налог, взимаемый Администратумом практически с каждой планеты Империума под неусыпным взором Адептус Арбитес.

languages.text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: Налог, взимаемый Администратумом практически с каждой планеты Империума под неусыпным взором Адептус Арбитес.

traits.locale_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: Eine Steuer, die fast jeder Planet im Imperium entrichten muss. Sie wird vom Administratum eingetrieben, unter dem wachsamen Auge der Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Eine Steuer, die fast jeder Planet im Imperium entrichten muss. Sie wird vom Administratum eingetrieben, unter dem wachsamen Auge der Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: Une taxe imposée à presque tous les mondes de l'Imperium et perçue par l'Administratum sous la surveillance de l'Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Une taxe imposée à presque tous les mondes de l'Imperium et perçue par l'Administratum sous la surveillance de l'Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: 帝国境内几乎所有世界都需要缴纳什一税。这种税务由帝国内政部负责征收，由帝国法务部全权监督。
languages.original_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: 帝国境内几乎所有世界都需要缴纳什一税。这种税务由帝国内政部负责征收，由帝国法务部全权监督。

languages.text: Un impuesto sobre prácticamente todos los planetas del Imperium, recolectado por el Administratum bajo la vigilancia del Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Un impuesto sobre prácticamente todos los planetas del Imperium, recolectado por el Administratum bajo la vigilancia del Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: 帝国のほぼすべての惑星に課される税である。高等裁定局の監視のもと、帝国行政局に徴収される。
languages.original_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: 帝国のほぼすべての惑星に課される税である。高等裁定局の監視のもと、帝国行政局に徴収される。

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un hemen hemen her gezegenine uygulanan ve Adeptus Arbites'in titiz gözetimi altında Administratum tarafından toplanan bir vergi.
languages.original_text: A tax imposed on virtually every planet in the Imperium, which is collected by the Administratum under the watchful eye of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk'un hemen hemen her gezegenine uygulanan ve Adeptus Arbites'in titiz gözetimi altında Administratum tarafından toplanan bir vergi.
